changeSet.createView: SELECT bd.ENTITY_ID, bd.DEAL_TYPE_CODE, bd.COMMODITY_CODE, bd.DEAL_STATUS_CODE, bd.POSITION_GENERATION_STATUS_CODE, bd.POSITION_GENERATION_IDENTIFIER, bd.POSITION_GENERATION_DATE_TIME, bd.START_DATE, bd.END_DATE, bd.BUY_SELL_CODE, bd.REPORTING_CURRENCY_CODE, bd.TICKET_NO, bd.VOLUME_QUANTITY, bd.VOLUME_UOM_CODE, bd.VOLUME_FREQUENCY_CODE, bd.SETTLEMENT_CURRENCY_CODE, bd.POWER_PROFILE_ID, bd.FIXED_PRICE, bd.FIXED_PRICE_UOM_CODE, bd.FIXED_PRICE_CURRENCY_CODE, phy.MARKET_VALUATION_CODE, phy.MARKET_PRICE_INDEX_ID, phy.DEAL_PRICE_VALUATION_CODE, phy.DEAL_PRICE_INDEX_ID, swp.PAYS_VALUATION_CODE, swp.PAYS_INDEX_ID, swp.RECEIVES_VALUATION_CODE, swp.RECEIVES_INDEX_ID FROM BASE_DEAL bd LEFT OUTER JOIN PHYSICAL_DEAL phy ON bd.ENTITY_ID = phy.ENTITY_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN FINANCIAL_SWAP_DEAL swp ON bd.ENTITY_ID = swp.ENTITY_ID
